name: Jackal
description: This is a story about a man who finds himself in a difficult situation and urgently needs money, so he takes up dirty work being a mercenary. Being an inexperienced mercenary working alone, you'll need to find your own solution out of all the possibilities that the game will present you with.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Pentium® 4 2,0 ГГц  or Athlon® XP  2,0 ГГц Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 6200 or ATI Radeon 9600 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9 compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Pentium® 4 2,0 ГГц  or Athlon® XP  2,0 ГГц Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 8600 или ATI Radeon HD series DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9 compatible

reviews.review_text: The game seems to crash qite a bit but the idea of the game seems great I hope the crashing problem gets fixed in the near future but all in all I recommend you get this game. When the crashing problem gets fixed this is going to be a very enjoyable game.  9 out of 10 providing the crashing problem gets fixed.   P.S  The crashes seem to happen when trying to load to the seconed level of the game (after the basic tutorial) this may be cause an optimization issue or the level transition its self the crashes may also be caused by scrip errors being created by the A.I or the A.I its self. I hope you found this information helpful.

Don't buy it!  The game crashes on loading screen, every single time.   The developer peace_salikhov said here in the forum to other people: 'The game should start with several attempts.' 'Try now. Try many times,please.' That is not a good answer...

DON'T BUY DON'T BUY DON'T BUY DON'T BUY DON'T BUY DON'T BUY DON'T BUY   First I must say that I had a f'n pain in the lower part of my back to end this game with its infinite crashes. I really wanted to like it so I tried many times and more.  PROs: Interesting Idea. The dev had a nice concept that feels like a movie. Soundtrack  CONs: The game crash at every loading screens. You really need to run it like 5 times on each loading screens to overcome the crash. The graphics are horrible. (A game using the FPS Creator engine.) Only 5 levels and VERY VERY VERY easy to finish. Very small levels. The game ain't fully translated AND MANY BUGS   I finished the game about 24 minutes and thats counting the fact that I had to relaunch it about 60 times to finish it.  (Note to the creator: FORGET ABOUT FPS CREATOR!) p.s: I noticed some little things that might not be allowed to be used in this game. Like Markiplier's face on a newspaper.  DON'T BUY It's too short, too ugly, too buggy to even worth $0.01. DON'T BUY DON'T BUY DON'T BUY DON'T BUY DON'T BUY DON'T BUY DON'T BUY DON'T BUY DON'T BUY DON'T BUY DON'T BUY DON'T BUY DON'T BUY DON'T BUY DON'T BUY DON'T BUY DON'T BUY DON'T BUY DON'T BUY DON'T BUY DON'T BUY DON'T BUY DON'T BUY DON'T BUY DON'T BUY DON'T BUY DON'T BUY DON'T BUY DON'T BUY DON'T BUY DON'T BUY DON'T BUY DON'T BUY DON'T BUY
If Skyrim didnt't have enough loading screens and crashes for you, that's your game. It's got both of them together - Crash on EVERY loading screen a multiple times, guaranteed!! :D 10/10 IGN
